mapper.select: SELECT c.clno, c.cltitle, SUBSTR(c.claddr, 1, INSTR(c.claddr, ' ', 1, 2) - 1), c.climg, c.cllevel, c.clprice, b.bcaname, s.scaname, c.cltype FROM class c JOIN account a ON c.aid = a.aid JOIN scategory s ON c.scano = s.scano JOIN bcategory b ON s.bcano = b.bcano WHERE bcaname like '%'||#{bcaname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
